CodexEntry.name: Smart Grid
CodexEntry.description: A powerful system of computer controls that predict and optimize power usage. It both minimizes costs and is more resilient against outages than conventional grids.

CodexEntry.name: Electrofuels
CodexEntry.description: Uses non-photosynthetic microorganisms to convert carbon dioxide into energy. Has the potential to be 10x more efficient than petroleum or biofuels./n -Colombia University

CodexEntry.name: Biodiesel
CodexEntry.description: Developed from Fir Trees, biodiesel is an alternative to conventional D2 diesel (road diesel) used in commercial trucking. It holds the promise of greater energy independence for the country. /n -Joint BioEnergy Institute

CodexEntry.name: Silicon Carbide Thyristors
CodexEntry.description: Optimized thyristor technology for high efficiency power conversion. Handles higher temperatures dramatically faster than traditional thyristor designs./n -GeneSiC Semiconductor and Sandia National Laboratory

CodexEntry.name: Fish-Friendly Turbine
CodexEntry.description: This cutting edge turbine design reduces the risk of injury and mortality amongst fish populations traversing dammed rivers. /n -EPRI, Alden Laboratories

CodexEntry.name: Organic Flash Cycle
CodexEntry.description: Reclaims waste heat given off by machinery and converts it into usable energy. /n -Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory

CodexEntry.name: Integrated Ventilation Controller
CodexEntry.description: Optimizes ventalation and air flow for air conditioning systems, reducing power usage by 18 to 44% /n -Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory

CodexEntry.name: Transition Metal Switchable Mirrors
CodexEntry.description: Thin film of magnesium alloy that can switch from reflective and transparent states. Designed to dramatically reduce air conditioning costs in large office buildings. /n -Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory

CodexEntry.name: Electrochemical Solution Growth
CodexEntry.description: A new technique enabling the rapid creation of large amounts of Gallium Nitride Crystals, used for high-efficiency LEDs and high-power transistors. /n -Sandia National Laboratories

CodexEntry.name: Volatile Organic Compounds Removal System
CodexEntry.description: Converts harmful gases into harmless carbon dioxide and water. Reduces power needs for lab air filtration systems./n -Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory

CodexEntry.name: Efficient Solar Cell Fabrication
CodexEntry.description: This new technique for solar panel fabrication uses microtextured substrates to optimize optical absorbtion at minimal cost. /n - Ames Laboratory

CodexEntry.name: Building-integrated Photovoltaic-Thermal Collector
CodexEntry.description: A hybrid solar thermal/electric collection module mounted to buildings to collect ambient heat and convert it to electrical power. /n -University of Colorado

CodexEntry.name: Hydrogen Storage
CodexEntry.description: An advanced catalyst that binds hydrogen to carbon dioxide in a basic solution for easy and viable hydrogen storage. /n -Brookhaven Lab

CodexEntry.name: Heat Transfer Interface for Thermo-Solar Energy
CodexEntry.description: Uses "nanotube forrests" to both absorb solar energy and then convert it into elecrical power. /n -Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory

CodexEntry.name: Efficient Polymer Solar Cells
CodexEntry.description: An optimized form of organic substrates used to create cheaper, more efficient solar cells. /n - Ames Laboratory

CodexEntry.name: Super Energy Saver Heat Pump
CodexEntry.description: Using hydrid phase-change materials, this dramatically improves the efficiency and emissions of heating pumps. /n -Oak Ridge National Laboratory

CodexEntry.name: Energy Efficient Laboratory Fume Hood
CodexEntry.description: This new technique for removing harmful vapors in laboratories uses a new low-flow circulation method to reduce power requirements by 75%. /n -Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory

CodexEntry.name: CCUS Oil Extraction
CodexEntry.description: This new method uses waste Carbon Dioxide from hydrogen production plants to dramatically improve the rate of oil extraction. /n -Air Products and Chemicals

CodexEntry.name: Tidal Power
CodexEntry.description: This new system enables engineers to tap into the power of the tides to produce energy from coastal oceanic currents.

CodexEntry.name: Waste to Energy
CodexEntry.description: Using anaerobic microbes to digest consumer waste, this system is able to produce methane gas to be used as a potent energy source.

CodexEntry.name: Combined Heat and Power
CodexEntry.description: By recycling waste heat generated during industrial processes, this new system helps save manufactures $100 billion in annual energy costs.

CodexEntry.name: Forecasting Grid
CodexEntry.description: An advanced system for forecasting weather patterns to reactively adjust heating and cooling systems to optimize power usage.

CodexEntry.name: Electric Car Charging Station
CodexEntry.description: A network of free charging stations for electric cars, dramatically cutting down on refueling costs and fossil fuel dependency.

CodexEntry.name: Solar-Powered Airplanes
CodexEntry.description: A new airplane prototype that not only utilizes solar power, but is capable of continuous flight for up to a month at a time!

CodexEntry.name: Alge Bio-Reactor
CodexEntry.description: A system whereby algae is grown on building-monted louvres and harvested to produce biogas to enable self-powering buildings.

CodexEntry.name: Power Plug Meter
CodexEntry.description: A handy device for precisely monitoring power usage and calculating its cost in dollars to help consumers and businesses more intelligently manage their power use.

CodexEntry.name: Non-Invasive Energy Meter
CodexEntry.description: A cheap, new system for installing energy meters into solar panel liquid flow systems to determine power generation with greater precision. /n -Sandia National Laboratories

CodexEntry.name: Liquid Metal Battery
CodexEntry.description: Using molten metals, this system allows for energy to be stored for years while requiring 50 to 100 times fewer cells than conventional lithium-ion battery systems.

CodexEntry.name: Air Powered Cars
CodexEntry.description: Fast, light, and environmentally friendly, these cars run entirely off of compressed air. Soon they'll be the cheapeast cars in the world!

CodexEntry.name: Nuclear Power
CodexEntry.description: Introduced to the public in 50's, Nuclear Power Plants demonstrated to the public that Atomic Power could be used as a tool for good rather than war.

CodexEntry.name: Ethanol Fuel
CodexEntry.description: By using corn instead of fossil fuels, it allows for far greater energy independence. In small levels, it can be easily added to conventional petroleum fuel.

CodexEntry.name: Geothermal Power
CodexEntry.description: New innovations in drilling techniques now allow us to create artificial geothermal resevoirs to harness the power of subterrainian lava flow.

CodexEntry.name: Modular Nuclear Reactors
CodexEntry.description: Smaller nuclear reactors promise to be cheaper, safer, and easier to upgrade, install, and maintain than conventional reactors.

CodexEntry.name: Silver Printing Method
CodexEntry.description: Thie new technique allows conductors to be printed onto a broader range of materials, making new types of electronic devices possible.-Sandia National Laboratories

CodexEntry.name: Microsolar Cells
CodexEntry.description: Microsolar cells require almost 100 times less silicon to produce than tradition cells and significantly lower manufacturing costs. -Sandia National Laboratories
